item.description:
Guess what everyone!

There will indeed be yet another chance to hang out this week!!!

This Friday our very own creator Barbara will be coming up to Boston to celebrate her birthday.

Just her being her warrants a gathering but since it's her birthday, who knows what ridiculousness will ensue.

Oo I do!!!

First, let's all meet up in Davis Square right outside JP Licks. We'll grab some ice cream or maybe some pizza next door or both. If the weather's holding we can do some improv outside and if not then we can bring our improv attitudes straight to the bowling alley and have some fun there.

I do not know if I can promise such things but I'm sure Barb will be strutting her dance moves all night long so you best be their to witness!

Any more details will be forthcoming! Any questions, contact our assistant organizer Doug!
at 6172237965

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.name: Barbara's Birthday Bash '08!!!!
